meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Schnippert Thomas Zamora Vinita Kailasanath Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3961.

div.div:
2001 College Championship final game 1.
From the campus at UCLA.
(Sarah: I'm Sarah of the Clue Crew: Today, I do something new. Next on Jeopardy! Hey! Which one's chocolate?)

td.p: Matt Schnippert, a sophomore at Florida State University from Jacksonville, Florida
Thomas Zamora, a junior at the University of Southern California from Cypress, California
Vinita Kailasanath, a sophomore at Stanford University from Laurel, Maryland

tr.td: BRIDGING THE WORLD
(Alex: We want you to name the major city each bridge serves. We'll give you the bridge.)
OLD GLORY
POETRY FILL IN THE BLANK
GOOD EATS
ALL SPORT
COW TIPPING

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', '(Thomas: Um... [sighs] I just don\'t know.)
(Alex: Wanna pick a name?)
(Thomas: Uh... I don\'t know. [*]?)
(Alex: Yes!)
(Thomas: Who is [*]? Who is [*]?)
[Extreme cheering and screaming; the camera turns on two rows of fans in USC attire jumping for joy.]
(Alex: Aw! Aw! Talk about pulling something out of thin air. Thomas, go again.)

Ionesco

Thomas
')
